content: **finished sizes ** s/m l/xl 2x/3x 4x/5x **finished measurements ** bust 44½ 53 61½ 70 inches back length 24 24¾ 25½ 26¼ inches measured from back hem up to shoulder front length 20 20¾ 21½ 22 ¼ inches shown in size 44½ inches recommended positive ease 4 8 inches **gauge** 11½ sts and 7 row = 4 inches in double_crochet 16 sts and 11½ row = 4 inches in ribbing take time to check gauge **materials** berroco vintage chunky bulky weight 52% acrylic 40% wool 8% nylon 136 yds/100g ball 10 12 14 16 hanks #6199 sage us size j/10 6mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle **pattern notes** pullover is worked flat in pieces and seamed
